p: Sánchez-González et al. [ 33, 40] established that the essential oil of Melaleuca alternifolia, also known as tea tree essential oil (TTO) is composed of terpene, mainly monoterpenes, sesquiterpenes, and tertiary alcohols [ 33, 40, 41, 42, 43]. The main components of TTO are terpineol, cineol, pinen, and terpinen and demonstrated antimicrobial activity [ 40, 44].
